alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 12:11PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, southwestern Jefferson, northwestern Taylor, southeastern Leon and southwestern Madison Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1210 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles southwest of Monticello to near St. Marks. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marks, Woodville, Greenville, Newport, Cody, Hells Half Acre, Ebb, Lamont, Eridu, Nash, Cabbage Grove, Thomas City, Scanlon, Waukeenah, Wacissa, Wacissa Springs, Natural Bridge, Liveoak Island, Sirmans and Goose Pasture. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Madison
